channel.title: web on Tahoma2D
channel.description: Recent content in web on Tahoma2D

item.title: What's makes Tahoma2D different?
item.description: Coming from OpenToonz? If you are coming to Tahoma2D from OpenToonz, it will feel very familiar. But you will start to notice small changes here and there that help make the experience better. The list of changes is pretty big. I’ll go into more depth about some of these in the future. UI Updated styles by konero New status bar at the bottom of the program to give hints and tips.

item.title: First Feature
item.description: Fun Fact: The first feature added to Tahoma2D after splitting from OpenToonz was the Test Shots ability in the stop motion panel.
